籤詩版本二:
Xa kufika intwasahlobo, kuyanyikima iindudumo kwaye izinambuzane zintyiloza, kwaye ndiyaluyeka udaka
Ndathi xa ndibona ukuba ndisaya ndihamba, ndake ndatshintsha, ndaba ligongqongqo.
詩意:
Le hexagram ifana neendudumo kunye nezinambuzane.
Ukudibana nomntu ohloniphekileyo luphawu oluhle kuyo yonke into.
解曰: Iindudumo ziyabetha. Iidiphozithi ezimbini ngaphakathi nangaphandle. Guqula kube kanye. Kuze kube nguTianmen.
籤詩故事一:
◇Chenqiao Mutiny
Ngo-959 AD, uZhou Shizong Chai Rong wasweleka, kwaye uMlawuli uGong, uChai Zongxun, owangena esihlalweni, wayeneminyaka esixhenxe kuphela ubudala. Ngelo xesha, uZhao Kuangyin, owayesebenza njengomhloli phambi kwebhotwe kunye nomthunywa we-Songzhou kwi-Army yaseJamani, wayephethe amandla okwenene.
Ngentwasahlobo yowama-960 AD, iZhenzhou (iZhengding yanamhlanje, iPhondo laseHebei) kunye neDingzhou (iNqila yaseDingxian yanamhlanje, kwiPhondo laseHebei) yanikela ingxelo yokuba imikhosi yoBukhosi baseMantla eHan kunye neLiao State yayihamba ngokudibeneyo ukuya kuhlasela uBukhosi bukaZhou bakamva, kunye. umfutho omkhulu, kwaye wacela ukuba kuthunyelwe amajoni ukuze ancede. Kamva, iZhou Dynasty yayalela uZhao Kuangyin ukuba akhokele imikhosi yakhe emantla ukuba ilwe notshaba. UZhao Kuangyin wenza ngokufihlakeleyo phantsi kokucwangciswa komntakwabo uZhao Guangyi, uZhao Pu, uShi Shouxin nabanye.
Ngomhla wesi-3 kuMdumba, xa umkhosi ufika eChenqiaoyi (ngoku eyiDolophu yaseChenqiao, kumzantsi-mpuma weFengqiu, eHenan), wavukela waza wayalela amajoni ukuba amnxibe imiwunduzo etyheli. . Emva koko, uZhao wakhokela imikhosi yakhe ebuyela eKaifeng ngaphandle kokutshisa, ukubulala okanye ukuphanga." UTaizu Chen Qiao wenza isifungo sokungabaphazamisi abantu bekomkhulu, kwaye wathembisa ukuba akayi kuphazamisa isixeko ngosuku angena ngalo esixekweni."
Ngomhla wesithathu kunyaka wesithathu wenyanga, uZhao Kuangyin waguquka e-Chenqiao waza wabuyela kwikomkhulu. : "Le mikhosi mithathu ayinankosi. Iinjengele zigqibe kwelokuba zimmisele njengomlawuli. Nabani na othe wathetha phandle uya kubulawa!". Ubuso bukaWang Pu babumhlophe njengomhlaba, wehlisa amanyathelo akhe waqubuda. UFan Zhi naye waqubuda. UKuang Yin buqu wamncedisa wamphakamisa waza wamphatha ngembeko enkulu.
Emva kokuchasa okulinganiselweyo, uMlawuli uGong we-Later Zhou Dynasty wathatha itrone, waza uZhao wathatha itrone. waza wangena ecaleni kwakhe, esithi: “Kwenzekile.”
Emva kokuba uZhao ehleli esihlalweni, waliguqula igama lelizwe laba nguNgoma, uYuan waba nguJianlong, wenza iKaifeng ikomkhulu, uShi Shouxin, uGao Huaide, uZhang Lingduo, uWang Shenqi, uZhang Guanghan, noZhao Yanhui bonke bawongwa ngesihloko esithi Jiedushi. , eyaziwa ngokuba yi "Chenqiao Mutiny" kwimbali.
